then you spawn particles with the part_particles_create/part_particles_create_colour
create is where you define the particles

you use that to spawn particles
types are defined in create event there
and yea you need to input your own sprites
and those lines define the particle behaviour
so it's gonna despawn after 25 frames since its life is 25
